page.title: 02ST PETER'S PARISH CHURCH
page.content:
The {Parish Church }of {Braunstone} is {St. Peter's.}There is a team of vicars. They are _ {Rev. Michael Woods {Rev. Alan Archer and {Father Ashley.}
The Rev. Michael Woods kindly showed us around his Church and answered our questions. We enjoyed looking around the Church and found that it was built in 1168 and is now 817 years old. The Church holds 7 services every week. There is a service every week day at 9.30 in the morning and two services every Sunday _ at 10.00 in the morning and an evening service at 6.30 p.m.. On a Sunday, about 66 people attend the services and about 25 attend each weekday service. The vicars take the services, visit the sick,attend meetings and help people.
